result.html: A bhuí le DiaThanks be to God.

result.eng: Please stand behind the yellow line.

result.eng: The problem is solved, thanks to you.
result.ga: Tá an fhadhb réitithe a bhuí leatsa

result.ponchtml: Tá an ḟaḋb réitiṫe a ḃuí leatsaThe problem is solved, thanks to you.

result.eng: Sport is more visible nowadays thanks to the media.

result.eng: It is a few kilometers from An Bóthar Buí.
